Score community-acquired pneumonia severity using CURB-65

Source: R/pneumonia.R
score_curb65.Rd

The CURB-65 community-acquired pneumonia severity score is used to estimate mortality.

score_curb65(confusion, urea, respiratory_rate, sbp, dbp, age)

Arguments

confusion

Mental confusion (TRUE or FALSE).
urea

Blood urea nitrogen (mmol/l).
respiratory_rate

Respiratory rate (/min).
sbp

Systolic blood pressure (mmHg).
dbp

Diastolic blood pressure (mmHg).
age

Age (years).

Value

CURB-65 score (points).

Caveats

None at this time.

References

Lim, W. S. Defining community acquired pneumonia severity on presentation to hospital: an international derivation and validation study. Thorax 58, 377–382 (2003)..

Contents

Developed by Lars Steggink.
